channel.title: The Old Nite- DEAD?!?!
channel.description:
I stumbled upon this phrase many times. i would like to have any more information that is possible. I want to see an article explaining how he died and ect. A few days ago I recieved news from a dear friend that The Old Nite has passed away. For several months now The Old Nite has been battling cancer and as of two weeks ago he has passed on. The Old Nite was a wonderful man and a great RuneScape player, having maxed his character's Skill Total. Being the second player to ever accomplish this in RuneScape history. He would always help you out in game any way that his character's levels would allow.
He was a great person who would take time out of his busy schedule to talk to you over Private message. If you were fortunate enough to have him added to your Friend's list. The times that I talked with Nite were great times and they will surely be missed. I'm just glad to know that he is in a better place and I wish his family all the best though this difficult time. My thoughts and prayers go out to them.
R.I.P Nite. You will truely be missed.
EDIT BY ADMIN: Confirmed. See reply here: http://forum.tip.it/viewtopic.php?p=3126570#3126570
^^ thanks to poopy for that!
